description: This course is designed to cover the Hows and Whys of Meditation to provide students with in-depth understanding of the field of meditation. All those who want to start or already have established in meditation will be greatly benefitted by this course as it contains the essence of more than 12 years of research of various school of thoughts in meditation. The course is structured in 3 sections covering the overview, practice and benefits of meditation. Lectures are video lectures with presentation as an aid with total of 9 lectures covering 81 hard-core learning capsules. This course can be completed in a span of two weeks although it is recommended to take it slowly to internalise the concepts. There are students who are practicing meditation for years and they are well established in one or two techniques, yet unaware of the science behind it. For all those, this course will be an eye-opener. Overall, all those interested in pursuing meditation for living a richer life should definitely take this course as it cover the basic fundamentals of meditation in a comprehensive manner.
title: Basics of Meditation
